Solve a Problem

Report a Code Violation

Complete an online form or call 541-774-2016.

Citizen Infrastructure Request

Complete an online request relating to streets, traffic, lights, storm drain, sewer, ADA, sidewalks, etc.

Is Something Broken?

Complete an online service request for repairs or maintenance of potholes, signs, street lights, etc.

Report a Spill
